Title: The Last Metro
Writer: François Truffaut (scenario), Suzanne Schiffman (scenario), François Truffaut (dialogue), Suzanne Schiffman (dialogue), Jean-Claude Grumberg (dialogue)
Actors: Catherine Deneuve, Gérard Depardieu, Jean Poiret, Andréa Ferréol
Plot: Paris, 1942. Lucas Steiner is a Jew and was compelled to leave the country. His wife Marion, an actress, directs the theater for him. She tries to keep the theater alive with a new play, and hires Bernard Granger for the leading role. But Lucas is actually hiding in the basement... A film about art and life.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 13 wins & 6 nominations.
